report.title: Mapping of INNS Mapper treatments
report.description: Mapping of INNS Mapper treatment samples
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM ( SELECT f.id, snf.public_entered_sref as entered_sref, f.date_start, f.date_end, f.date_type, ltt573.term as method, ltt574.term as species, f.created_by_id, snf.recorders as input_by, f.public_geom as geom FROM cache_samples_functional f JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=f.id LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sample573 ON sample573.sample_id=f.id AND sample573.sample_attribute_id=573 AND sample573.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ltt573 ON ltt573.id=sample573.int_value LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sample574 ON sample574.sample_id=f.id AND sample574.sample_attribute_id=574 AND sample574.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ltt574 ON ltt574.id=sample574.int_value #joins# WHERE f.website_id=73 AND f.survey_id=286 AND f.location_id_country=1605 UNION SELECT distinct f.sample_id, snf.public_entered_sref, f.date_start, f.date_end, f.date_type, t.term as method, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as species, f.created_by_id, snf.recorders as input_by, f.public_geom as geom FROM cache_occurrences_functional f JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=f.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=f.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN occurrence_attribute_values v ON v.occurrence_id=f.id and v.occurrence_attribute_id=458 and v.deleted=false and v.int_value not in (5502, 5494) JOIN cache_termlists_terms t ON t.id=v.int_value #joins# WHERE f.website_id=17 AND f.survey_id=44 AND f.date_start > now() - '5 years'::interval AND f.location_id_country=1605 ) AS sub WHERE 1=1 #filters# #idlist#

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the warehouse user

param.name: region_location_id
param.join: JOIN locations lr ON lr.location_type_id=14228 AND st_intersects(lr.boundary_geom, f.public_geom) AND lr.id=#region_location_id#

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.
